sections.heading: Short title. This Act may be cited as the Agriculture Equity Commission Act.

sections.heading: Duties of the Commission. The Agriculture Equity Commission shall have the following duties:

sections.heading: Report. The Agriculture Equity Commission shall annually report to the Governor and the General Assembly on its findings, recommendations, and other relevant matters concerning and based upon its duties as prescribed under Section 10
sections.text: Report. The Agriculture Equity Commission shall annually report to the Governor and the General Assembly on its findings, recommendations, and other relevant matters concerning and based upon its duties as prescribed under Section 10.
